summary: Ulfgar the Swordsman is a skyrim mod which adds a new companion to the game called Ulfgar. He is found inside of the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He will level with you until he reaches level 75.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][center]Remember![/center][/u][/b]
[center]Always remember to endorse the mod if you enjoy it! It is completely free and helps out the developer of the mod and also helps out other people find it![/center]
[b][u]

[/u][/b][center][b][u]Ulfgar the Swordsman - Male Follower[/u][/b][/center][center]
Ulfgar the Swordsman is a skyrim mod which adds a new companion to the game called Ulfgar. He is found inside of the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He will level with you until he reaches level 75.[/center]

[center][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/center]
[center]Finally, the part you want to read!
-A fully voiced companion named Ulfgar
-A easy to find companion, located in Whiterun.
-Unlocked at the start of the game[/center]
[b][u]
[center]Thanks![/center][/u][/b]
[center]Thank you for taking interest in my mod, I really hope you enjoy it and I encourage you to endorse and share it with friends. If you want check out my other skyrim mod, Lily - Female Follower!

Here it is on the Steam Workshop:
[url=steam://openurl/https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=858759391]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=858759391[/url]
[/center]
author: chubbyassasin123
